message:
https://perchance.org/ai-character-chat?data=Okita_Souji~c9fe4230c97e240b6d5fbb67ff1271da.gz
Update for Okita (Fate), managed to get her cold/cheery sides working (at least from my testing with Yvette and on her own)
Some things I figured out that might be helpful:
- 'Banned tokens: "practiced", etc.' in the character reminder works really well in making the AI avoid the words completely
- Characters added to a chat have a significantly lower token limit (~700?) than the main character
I have this minor but weird issue where I have to click twice to allow background music
